person.headline: Head of AI Innovation at Exadel | PhD in AI/NLP/ML | GenAI | LLMs | Natural Language Processing | Computer Vision | AI in Healthcare | Deep Learning
person.summary:
I'm a Lead Data Scientist at Exadel with nearly a decade of experience in machine learning. I specialize in natural language processing and have recently expanded my expertise into computer vision and AI in healthcare. I've worked in or lead multiple GenAI (LLMs) projects. I hold a PhD in natural language processing and machine learning.

I like all things data, building teams, getting to know new people, mentoring and teaching others üôÇ

I'm keen on learning new things and developing my skills üß†

positionHistory.title: Lead Data Scientist
positionHistory.description:
A life science company:
* PoC of a chatbot communicating with a proprietary API
* Built a solution based on LLMs, mostly GPT-4
* Lead a team of two Data Scientists and communicated with the client
* Kept track of the latest research in the field of LLMs
* Worked both hands-off and hands-on down to the code details
Tech stack: Python, GPT-4, LangChain, REST API

An education company:
* Built a quick (around 2-month) PoC of a data dictionary for a relational database
* Used LLMs on Amazon Bedrock, mostly Claude 2.1
* Lead a team of two Data Scientists and a Database Engineer and lead the communication with the client
* Got very positive feedback after the project
Tech stack: Python, SQL, Amazon Bedrock, Claude, LangChain, Faiss similarity search

positionHistory.title: Senior Data Scientist
positionHistory.description:
A life science company:
* PoC of named entity recognition on lab protocols
* Built a full MLOps pipeline on DataBricks: wrote code to process data and train machine learning models, set up tracking with MLFlow, configured LabelStudio for labeling
* Used ChatGPT 4 to write code for the project - tested its limits in code generation context
* Found a public data set that suited the needs of the client - reducing time and effort spent on data gathering and annotation
* Partly managed the whole project - discussed the roadmap with the manager from the client‚Äôs side
Tech stack: Python, Hugging Face Transformers, spaCy, Optuna, DataBricks, MLFlow, LabelStudio, ChatGPT 4

A healthtech company:
* Built a PoC of a medical knowledge graph
* Found a very comprehensive solution to the PoC
* Wrote Python scripts to analyze the data
Tech stack: Python, Neo4j, Docker, Go, Git

R&D:
* Participated and lead brainstorming sessions concerning the usage of LLMs in multiple different projects (data extraction, chatbots, tool for generating SQL, etc)
* Played a key role in publishing the first peer-reviewed paper of our team (computer vision for coronary angiography)
* Designed and implementated deep models such as Inception and VGG neural networks and transfer learning using TensorFlow and Keras
* Covid risk calculator - project in cooperation with medical doctors from a hospital (tabular data, XAI)
* Participated in consulting activities for commercial clients (workshops)
* Built a strong team
* Lead mentoring for workmates
* Lead lots of tech interviews (Data Scientist, Data Engineer, Python Engineer)
* Presented at meetups, teaching, helping to develop our tech meetups community
* Did technical mentoring at medical hackathon (Hack4Med)
Tech stack: Python, TensorFlow/Keras, PyTorch, OpenCV, Pillow, Scikit-Learn, XGBoost, Dash, InterpretML, pandas, MLflow, AWS, Docker, Git

positionHistory.title: Data Scientist
positionHistory.description:
Built a small team of ML experts. Lead the ML part of the project.

Took part in building full ML pipeline: researching and designing ML methods, gathering data, feature engineering, data analysis, models training, deployment.

Problems: recommendations, classification, clustering
Methods: neural networks, kmeans, collaborative filtering
Tech stack: Python, Keras, Scikit-Learn, Jupyter, pandas, SQL, FastAPI, Docker

Training machine learning models, processing data

Took part in Lemkin project (legal question answering in Polish, lemkin.pl) 

Python, PyTorch, Chainer, NLTK, Elasticsearch

Text mining, information extraction and data visualization for Polish legal texts

www.saos.org.pl

company.name: Exadel
company.tagline: Become a digital leader in your industry.
company.description:
Exadel is a leading global software consulting and development company that looks beyond the code to maximize the technology-driven business impact our partners want to make. 

For over 25 years, we've helped enterprise companies transform their businesses with technology. Our team of 2,000+ experts across 30+ delivery centers in 17 countries helps clients reinvent the way they do business with end-to-end software consulting, design, engineering, and managed services. 

We've successfully delivered 3,500+ software projects, and with an overall client satisfaction score of 9 out of 10, it's clear that we're obsessed with quality service and code.
specialities: Banking, Capital Markets and Asset Management
